title: Blueprints
body: I bought already 3 750 ip cases and bought the 1500 one but i need just 1 more core how cloud i get it??

replies.body:
With all the IP-available items, you get 12 cores.
You need 7 for a First Strike Border. So 14 for 2 borders.
You need 11 for a Blueprint.

So 18 for a Blueprint and a border. Why the heck do you need "just 1 more" core? If you really need just 1, you must have missed some of the stuff available for just IP.

After unlocking the unique caches that go for IP or RP, the only way to get more cores is to purchase the Augmented caches for RP in the store. 

For complete details on this event, check out our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.
